languages.text: "Мда, поступок похвальный... только, зная Футфол, вряд ли очищенное от ереси место будет оставаться пустым так уж долго. Эта станция притягивает мерзость словно... кхм, ну вы поняли".
"Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."
languages.original_text: "Мда, поступок похвальный... только, зная Футфол, вряд ли очищенное от ереси место будет оставаться пустым так уж долго. Эта станция притягивает мерзость словно... кхм, ну вы поняли".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."
"Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."
"Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."
"Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

languages.text: “是啊，是啊，这确实是件值得称赞的善行……不过，根据我对落脚港的了解，尽管那些异端被清理干净了，但那些地方恐怕不会闲置太久，而这座星站很能招脏东西，比如说……咳咳，你明白我的意思。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，是啊，这确实是件值得称赞的善行……不过，根据我对落脚港的了解，尽管那些异端被清理干净了，但那些地方恐怕不会闲置太久，而这座星站很能招脏东西，比如说……咳咳，你明白我的意思。”

languages.text: « Oui, oui, ce qu'elle a fait est admirable... Mais la purification de l'hérésie a laissé un vide, et Castel n'aime pas le vide. Cette station attire l'infamie comme... Bref, vous comprenez. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, oui, ce qu'elle a fait est admirable... Mais la purification de l'hérésie a laissé un vide, et Castel n'aime pas le vide. Cette station attire l'infamie comme... Bref, vous comprenez. »

languages.text: «Sí, sí, es una acción encomiable... pero conociendo Paso, el lugar del que ha extirpado la herejía no será puro durante mucho tiempo. La estación atrae la inmundicia como... bueno, ya me entiende».
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, sí, es una acción encomiable... pero conociendo Paso, el lugar del que ha extirpado la herejía no será puro durante mucho tiempo. La estación atrae la inmundicia como... bueno, ya me entiende».

languages.text: 「ええ、そうですとも、誉れある行為です…しかし、フットフォールを見るにつけ、異端を浄化した場所が長らくそのままということはないでしょう。このステーションは不敬を引きつけます、例えば…おほん、あなたもお分かりのとおりです」
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、そうですとも、誉れある行為です…しかし、フットフォールを見るにつけ、異端を浄化した場所が長らくそのままということはないでしょう。このステーションは不敬を引きつけます、例えば…おほん、あなたもお分かりのとおりです」

languages.text: "Ja, ja, es ist äußerst lobenswert ... Doch wie ich Footfall kenne, wird ein von der Ketzerei befreiter Ort nicht lange leer bleiben. Diese Station zieht die Fäulnis an wie ... ähem, Ihr versteht schon."
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ja, es ist äußerst lobenswert ... Doch wie ich Footfall kenne, wird ein von der Ketzerei befreiter Ort nicht lange leer bleiben. Diese Station zieht die Fäulnis an wie ... ähem, Ihr versteht schon."

languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

languages.text: "Evet, evet. Övgüye değer bir eylem. Ancak Binliman'ı ciğerini bilirim, kâfirlikten arındırılmışken burayı uzun süre boş bırakmayacaklardır. Bu istasyon pisliği çeker... Öhöm, siz anladınız."
languages.original_text: "Yes, yes, it is a commendable deed... But, knowing Footfall, it is unlikely that a place cleansed of heresy will remain empty for long. This station attracts foulness like... ahem, you understand."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, evet. Övgüye değer bir eylem. Ancak Binliman'ı ciğerini bilirim, kâfirlikten arındırılmışken burayı uzun süre boş bırakmayacaklardır. Bu istasyon pisliği çeker... Öhöm, siz anladınız."
